alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Powell and northwestern Estill Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winston, or 7 miles west of Irvine, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kings Station around 250 PM EDT. Rice Station, Fox, Witt and Iron Mound around 255 PM EDT. Calloway Crossing, Sandhill, Weedon, Wiseman Crossing Station, West Irvine, Hargett, Wisemantown and Station Camp around 300 PM EDT. Irvine, Ravenna, North Irvine, South Irvine and Kimbrell around 305 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hardwick, Willow Tree, Cow Creek, Doe Creek, Cottage Furnace, Pitts, Vaughns Mill, Pryse, Texola and Shade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
